attributes.action: not devalue the pound by printing more money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Printing extra money has only one benefit - providing yet more money to continue the "borrow from tomorrow to pay for today" mentality.

Printing extra money will simply confirm to all that living beyond our means is an acceptable way of modern life. We all, governments included, have to start existing within our means and to stop borrowing excessivly from tomorrow to pay for today.

Printing extra money will simply devalue the pound yet further, penalising those with savings and those that have made sound financial planning and continue the perception of the majority of the current generation that saving is a pointless exercise.
